programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Platoon - Os Bravos do Pelotão
programme.desc: Chris Taylor, um jovem e ingénuo americano, decide alistar-se como voluntário para combater na Guerra do Vietname. Chris pertence a um pelotão comandado pelo sargento Elias Grodin, um homem conhecedor e humanitário, e pelo sanguinário sargento Robert Barnes.

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.title: 47 Metros de Terror
programme.desc: Numa viagem ao México, duas irmãs aventuram-se num mergulho para observar os tubarões. No entanto, tudo corre terrivelmente mal quando o cabo que prendia a jaula de observação se parte e ambas ficam presas no fundo do oceano a 47 metros de profundidade...

programme.title: Horse Camp: A Love Tail
programme.desc: É um novo ano no campo de equitação de verão, mas desta vez, está tudo diferente: um novo conselheiro chefe, novos amigos para conquistar e, para melhorar as coisas, o fazendeiro tem uma paixão pela instrutora de equitação!

programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Uma história de amor que se desdobra em múltiplas linhas temporais, ao longo de 500 anos. As personagens conhecem-se, separam-se e voltam a reunir-se de uma vida para a próxima. As ações e escolhas individuais têm consequências e impactos entre si no passado, presente e futuro.

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Despojos de Inverno
programme.desc: Ree, de 17 anos, luta para encontrar o pai, procurado pela polícia, que desaparece após usar a sua casa como fiança. Confrontada com a possibilidade de perder a casa onde mora com os irmãos, Ree desafia os códigos de silêncio que imperam na sua comunidade e arrisca a vida para salvar a família.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, especialista em estruturas de segurança, aceita um desafio: fugir de uma instalação ultrassecreta e de alta tecnologia, "O Túmulo". Mas, uma vez prisioneiro, Breslin descobre que foi enganado e é considerado como um preso de verdade.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Estado Livre de Jones
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Newton Knight, um agricultor sulista, e da sua rebelião armada contra a Confederação em plena Guerra Civil. Unindo esforços, Knight despoletou uma revolta que levou o Condado Jones a tornar-se independente.

programme.title: Passageiros
programme.desc: Uma nave espacial, com destino a uma colónia distante, tem um problema nas câmaras de sono e dois passageiros, Aurora Lane e Jim Preston, acordam 90 anos antes da chegada ao destino. Ameaçados pelo iminente colapso da nave, tentam descobrir o porquê de terem acordado.

programme.title: Um Traidor dos Nossos
programme.desc: De férias, Perry e Gail conhecem um extravagante russo que pertence à Máfia. Quando ele lhes pede ajuda para fazer chegar informações confidenciais aos serviços secretos britânicos, Perry e Gail são apanhados no perigoso mundo da espionagem.

programme.title: Balas & Bolinhos - O Último Capítulo
programme.desc: A vida continua difícil para Culatra, Rato e Bino. Mas tudo muda quando Tone, o homem do Mundo, regressa a casa para tentar salvar o pai, que está às portas da morte. E quando o reencontro acontece partem para a mais surpreendente das suas aventuras.

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos
programme.desc: Uma aluna do liceu suspeita que os assassinatos do Campus estão relacionados com Lendas Urbanas.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: Crime Sangrento
programme.desc: Depois de mudar-se para Seattle, Daniel Pruitt, um detetive da polícia, atende aos pedidos da mulher Jessica e concorda em acampar na floresta. Quando ele vai comprar comida ela é atacada, mas Jessica consegue fugir e Daniel encontra-a caída no meio da estrada.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: O Cavalheiro Com Arma
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de Forrest Tucker, considerado o ladrão mais simpático de sempre. Forrest escapou audaciosamente da prisão de San Quentin aos 70 anos e fez uma série de assaltos que baralharam as autoridades e encantaram o público.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa cidade, prestes a festejar o seu centenário, os habitantes tornam-se vítimas de espetros assassinos que escondem um segredo inquietante.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Depois de 20 anos fora de Edimburgo, Mark Renton está de regresso à Escócia, o único lugar a que alguma vez chamou casa. À sua espera estão os velhos amigos: Spud, Sick Boy e Begbie. Muito mudou, mas muito ficou na mesma...

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: Um pulso inteligente de eletricidade move-se de casa em casa. Aterroriza os ocupantes, assumindo o controlo dos aparelhos, matando-os ou fazendo-os destruir a casa.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Golpes
programme.desc: Jack, um surfista e trapaceiro de segunda, que vai vivendo dos "trabalhinhos" que faz no Havai, conhece uma bela mulher que tem um plano infalível para fazer fortuna. Tudo que Jack tem de fazer é entrar numa casa pobre... e sair um homem rico.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: De visita a Atenas, o casal Chester e Colette faz amizade com um guia local. Mas, quando este faz uma visita, vê-se forçado a esconder o corpo inconsciente de um homem que supostamente terá atacado o casal. O trio acaba envolvido num crime do qual não pode mais fugir.

programme.title: Drácula de Bram Stoker
programme.desc: Neste remake da clássica história, o príncipe da Transilvânia, no século XIX, viaja até Londres em busca de amor humano. Depois de viver sozinho durante anos, o desejo de Drácula por algo humano transforma-se no seu maior propósito. Em Londres, este encontra Mina, uma sósia da sua falecida mulher.

programme.title: Madame
programme.desc: Anne e Bob mudam-se para uma mansão em Paris e, quando preparam um luxuoso jantar de amigos, Anne apercebe-se que vão sentar-se 13 pessoas à mesa. Para evitar o número do azar, pede à sua leal criada Maria para se disfarçar de aristocrata espanhola...

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: Manchester By The Sea
programme.desc: A vida do solitário Lee Chandler é irreversivelmente transformada quando volta à sua cidade natal para cuidar do sobrinho. Patrick ficou órfão e Lee foi nomeado tutor do jovem de 16 anos. Mas além das dificuldades evidentes que tem pela frente, o regresso de Lee vai ainda reabrir feridas antigas.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: Alta Golpada
programme.desc: Josh Kovacs gere um dos mais sumptuosos e protegidos edifícios de Nova Iorque. Quando Arthur Shaw, o magnata da Wall Street que habita a "penthouse", é mantido em prisão domiciliária, acusado de roubar mais de dois milhões de dólares, Josh e os empregados do prédio entram em pânico.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: Nightcrawler - Repórter na Noite
programme.desc: Lou Bloom é um jovem desesperado por trabalho, que descobre o alucinante mundo do crime de Los Angeles. Ao encontrar um grupo de freelancers que filmam casos de polícia, Lou entra no perigoso submundo do jornalismo criminal, onde uma sirene pode valer muitos dólares.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos 2
programme.desc: Amy, Travis e Graham são estudantes de cinema na Universidade de Alpine. Num ambiente de forte competividade, é convocado o prestigiado prémio Hitchcock para o melhor fime, como tese de final de curso. Quando começam a rodar o filme, dão-se estranhos e terroríficos acidentes.

programme.title: Anaconda - Rasto de Sangue
programme.desc: Neste quarto episódio da saga "Anacondas", Murdoch, um poderoso magnata com pouco tempo de vida, programa uma experiência com néctar de orquídeas sanguíneas com propriedades regeneradoras e testa-o numa cria de Anaconda.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: A Escolha de um Pai
programme.desc: Um cowboy profissional tem de superar a perda da mulher, cuidar das filhas e ainda enfrentar uma tia, que vem pedir a custódia das meninas.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE3ZTYxZWYtMjQ1Ny00MzFhLWI1MGMtMDZmMzYwYjc1OWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Supermanfan-13"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!","reviewBody":"I never read the Outlander books so I didn't really know what to expect. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alleypat"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny French detective series","reviewBody":"It's funny in subtle ways. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. As a mom, I can totally relate to Renoir's domestic delimmas interfering with work, and work interfering with her home life. I watch on Amazon Prime with subtitles. I highly recommend this show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Arranjos de Lírios
programme.desc: Abby Knight é uma bela ex-advogada e proprietária de Bloomers, uma pitoresca loja de flores. Abby e Marco, dono de um bar e ex-investigador, descobrem o corpo de Jack Sutcliff, um vigarista que tentou interromper o casamento da prima de Abby.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Lapsos Fatais
programme.desc: Billie Blessings passa de idolatrada chef, dona de restaurante e anfitriã de uma rubrica no programa da manhã, a suspeita principal num caso de homicídio quando um dos executivos da estação de televisão morre envenenado.

programme.title: Ligações Perigosas
programme.desc: Na França libertina do século XVIII, a Marquesa de Morteuil desafia o seu ex-amante, o Visconde de Valmont, a seduzir Madame de Tourvel, uma bela mulher, casada e temente a Deus. Ambos iniciam assim um perigoso jogo de seduções e enganos.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: Páscoa Infiltrada
programme.desc: Erin Cavendish infiltra-se na fábrica de chocolate da família para ver porque é que as vendas baixaram, e lá conhece o chefe chocolateiro Bryan, que tem ideias para inovar a linha de produtos para a Páscoa.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alleypat"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny French detective series","reviewBody":"It's funny in subtle ways. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. As a mom, I can totally relate to Renoir's domestic delimmas interfering with work, and work interfering with her home life. I watch on Amazon Prime with subtitles. programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Lapsos Fatais
programme.desc: Billie Blessings passa de idolatrada chef, dona de restaurante e anfitriã de uma rubrica no programa da manhã, a suspeita principal num caso de homicídio quando um dos executivos da estação de televisão morre envenenado.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Homicídio À La Carte
programme.desc: Quando um cadáver é encontrado no carro de um chef rival, Billie aceita cobrir a história no seu programa de televisão, o que vai colocar a sua vida em perigo.

programme.title: Maridos e Mulheres
programme.desc: Gabe e Judy estão chocados com a separação dos melhores amigos. Mas esta situação faz com que eles se questionem sobre o seu relacionamento. Enquanto Gabe pensa em namoriscar uma das suas alunas, o outro casal descobre que a vida de solteiro não é assim tão boa e pensa dar nova vida ao casamento.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Amor, Estúpido e Louco
programme.desc: Cal Weaver acha que tem o casamento perfeito até que Emily lhe pede o divórcio. Cal, agora solteiro, parte em busca do amor com a ajuda do perito em mulheres Jacob Palmer. Entre paixonetas e encontros, Cal e Jacob percebem que sem a pessoa certa o amor não é só estúpido e louco, é também impossível!

programme.title: Amigas e Rivais
programme.desc: Larry Cook, um próspero fazendeiro do Iowa, decide reformar-se e dividir a sua terra pelas três filhas, Ginny, Rose e Caroline. Só que nem todas acolhem o legado da melhor forma e o que se segue, motivado por rivalidades diversas, acaba em tragédia...

programme.title: O Cadáver de Anna Fritz
programme.desc: Anna Fritz é uma atriz linda e famosa, que acabou de morrer e cujo corpo vai para a morgue. Três jovens decidem ir ver o corpo nu da artista, mas acabam por não resistir à tentação e como resultado mergulham num inferno sem igual, do qual será muito difícil sair.

programme.title: Operação Outubro Negro
programme.desc: Mike Anderson é um repórter e ex-militar que investiga um ataque numa base naval norte-americana no estrangeiro e que tem de fazer uma corrida contra o tempo para desmontar uma intriga terrorista e salvar milhares de vidas inocentes de uma catástrofe.

programme.title: Desculpa! Uma História Sobre Bullying
programme.desc: Jochem é vítima de bullying na escola. O seu amigo David não participa, mas tem medo de dizer alguma coisa. Quando o diretor da escola conta à turma que Jochem não voltou para casa depois de uma festa, David sente-se culpado. Mas será que é tarde demais?

programme.title: Tal Pai, Tal Mãe
programme.desc: Quando Florence e Vincent recebem, ao mesmo tempo, a promoção profissional há muito desejada, decidem que a sua vida de casal tem de acabar. Depois da guerra conjugal declarada, tudo o que nenhum dos dois quer é ficar com a guarda dos filhos...

programme.title: Estado de Calamidade
programme.desc: No ano 2030, o mundo está num estado de permanente recessão económica e a enfrentar sérios problemas ambientais em consequência do aquecimento global. Noah Kross é um agente do governo que fica sob grave suspeita ao adiar a decisão de enviar uma família para um centro de acolhimento.

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Um indivíduo em liberdade condicional junta-se à sua antiga equipa, que está determinada a encontrar um saco enterrado de dinheiro roubado há uma década, proveniente de uma rusga da DEA que correu mal. Ao mesmo tempo, é perseguido por um xerife reformado.

programme.title: Linda de Morrer
programme.desc: Na pequena cidade americana de Mount Rose, o muito aguardado concurso anual de beleza começa a gerar as maiores suspeitas quando várias concorrentes vão morrendo de forma misteriosa e se torna claro que há alguém a querer vencer a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Os Gloriosos 39
programme.desc: Às vésperas da Segunda Guerra Mundial, a filha adotiva de um destacado político britânico vai descobrir um segredo que envolve os dois lados do conflito.

programme.title: À Deriva
programme.desc: O destino aproxima o jovem casal, mas também os conduz à aventura de uma vida, quando têm de enfrentar um dos terramotos mais catastróficos da história. Inspirado em factos verídicos.

programme.title: Combate ao Passado
programme.desc: O agente Michael Dixon patrulha a fronteira entre os EUA e o México. A sua vida vai dar uma reviravolta quando a sua mulher e a filha são ameaçadas de morte por um gangue de Los Angeles a que ele outrora pertenceu e que o quer forçar a ajudar a traficar drogas entre os dois países.

programme.title: Supremacia
programme.desc: Bourne abandonou a vida de assassino da CIA e tem vivido, com Marie, uma vida no anonimato. No entanto, quando a localização dos dois é descoberta, Bourne vai ter de lutar pela sobrevivência do casal.

programme.title: Ultimato
programme.desc: Jason Bourne é um assassino profissional que, depois de perder a memória e a única pessoa que amava, não se deixa intimidar pelas rajadas de balas de uma nova geração de assassinos altamente treinados, que perseguem todos os seus movimentos.

programme.title: Comportem-se Como Adultos
programme.desc: Grécia 2015: a economia está no caos e o país à beira da bancarrota. Um novo governo revolta-se contra as regras restritivas da União Europeia e inspira milhões de europeus. O Ministro das Finanças grego, Yanis Varoufakis, vai ser o protagonista desse combate.

programme.title: Le Chant du Loup - Ameaça em Alto Mar
programme.desc: Chanteraide tem o raro dom de conseguir identificar todos os sons que ouve. A bordo de um submarino nuclear francês, tudo depende dele, só que, reputado como infalível, ele acaba por cometer um erro que coloca toda a equipa em perigo de morte.

programme.title: Stallone Prisioneiro
programme.desc: Prestes a ser libertado por um crime menor que cometeu, um prisioneiro é transferido para uma prisão onde o diretor vai fazer os possíveis para que ele tenha uma vida infernal.

programme.title: Testemunha Indiscreta
programme.desc: Após o falecimento da filha, um virar de página e a procura de uma nova vida bem longe da tragédia. O casal vai tomar conta de um motel no meio do nada. Numa das salas do motel, há uma sala muito requisitada pelos clientes com uma estranha passagem e que desemboca num também muito estranho espelho.

programme.title: VFW - O Último Reduto
programme.desc: Um grupo de veteranos de guerra vai arriscar a vida para defender uma adolescente inocente, que é perseguida por um traficante de drogas demente e o seu implacável exército de delinquentes.

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Assalto Inesperado
programme.desc: Quando um ladrão invade uma casa para um assalto, dá de caras com uma rapariga a meio de uma tentativa de suicídio. O que começa por ser uma aventura, rapidamente se transforma numa comédia romântica sobre duas pessoas que acabam por salvar-se uma à outra.

programme.title: Edmond
programme.desc: Paris, dezembro de 1897. Edmond Rostand não escreve nada há dois anos e em desespero propõe ao ator Constant Coquelin uma nova peça, uma comédia heroica, em verso, para a época festiva. Pequeno detalhe: a peça ainda não está escrita. À partida, tudo o que tem é o título: "Cyrano de Bergerac".

programme.title: Doidos à Solta
programme.desc: Lloyd e Harry são os maiores desastrados do mundo! Lloyd conduz ao aeroporto a jovem e bela Mary, por quem se apaixona de imediato. Mas a mulher esquece-se da mala onde está o dinheiro que serviria para pagar o resgate do marido. Agora, Lloyd convence o amigo Harry a ir com ele ter com Mary.

programme.title: Supremacia
programme.desc: Bourne abandonou a vida de assassino da CIA e tem vivido, com Marie, uma vida no anonimato. No entanto, quando a localização dos dois é descoberta, Bourne vai ter de lutar pela sobrevivência do casal.

programme.title: Ultimato
programme.desc: Jason Bourne é um assassino profissional que, depois de perder a memória e a única pessoa que amava, não se deixa intimidar pelas rajadas de balas de uma nova geração de assassinos altamente treinados, que perseguem todos os seus movimentos.

programme.title: Impacto Violento
programme.desc: Jeremy Barrett é um criminoso perigoso que, após ser preso, consegue tomar conta do avião que o transportava, libertar os outros prisioneiros e ameaça despenhar a aeronave numa área povoada. O agente do FBI Nick Halton decide tentar abordar o avião em pleno voo para conseguir detê-lo.

programme.title: Duro de Matar
programme.desc: Em 2002, a Autoridade Penal da Califórnia reabre a prisão mais famosa da história: Alcatraz. Um funcionário prisional, contrariado, organiza um comando para que se infiltre na reformada fortaleza de alta tecnologia e obrigue um preso a revelar o paradeiro de duzentos milhões de dólares.

programme.title: Ruptura Explosiva
programme.desc: Johnny Utah é um "caloiro" do FBI a quem foi dada uma missão: descobrir um bando de ladrões de bancos, que opera no sul da Califórnia e, ao que tudo indica, pode ser um grupo de surfistas. Quando ele se infiltra no grupo, conhece um viciado em adrenalina disposto a tudo para ter emoções fortes.

programme.title: Stallone Prisioneiro
programme.desc: Prestes a ser libertado por um crime menor que cometeu, um prisioneiro é transferido para uma prisão onde o diretor vai fazer os possíveis para que ele tenha uma vida infernal.

programme.title: A Filha do Lobo
programme.desc: Clair Hamilton é uma veterana do exército cujo filho adolescente foi raptado por criminosos. Hábil com todo o tipo de armas, ela não se vai deter perante nada nem ninguém para resgatar o seu rapaz.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Missy Peregrym (role=Special Agent Maggie Bell), Zeeko Zaki (role=Special Agent Omar Adom 'OA' Zidan), Jeremy Sisto (role=Assistant Special Agent in Charge Jubal Valentine), Ebonee Noel (role=Analyst Kristen Chazal), Alana De La Garza (role=Special Agent in Charge Isobel Castille), John Boyd (role=Special Agent Stuart Scola), Taylor Anthony Miller (role=Kelly Moran), James Chen (role=Ian Lim), Sela Ward (role=Dana Mosier), Vedette Lim (role=Elise Taylor), Roshawn Franklin (role=Special Agent Trevor Hobbs), Katherine Renee Turner (role=Special Agent Tiffany Wallace)

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. programme.title: Scorpion
Scorpion
programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. I would recommend seeing a doctor about removing the sticks from your butts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-22","keywords":"homeland security,outcast,misfit,nerd,brilliant mind","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175468/","name":"Elyes Gabel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897713/","name":"Katharine McPhee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858776/","name":"Eddie Kaye Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238801/","name":"Nick Santora"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2548022553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby"}}</script><metacontent="

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. IMDb data; ttnr: 3514324, Title: Scorpion, --- Description: Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173","dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
